describeIssuePlaceholder: Jaise, Komatsu PC200 excavator ka hydraulic arm slow hai aur main cylinder se fluid leak ho raha hai.
errorDescriptionRequired: Problem ka description dena zaroori hai.
errorInvalidFileTypeVideo: Galat file type. Kripya image (PNG, JPG) ya video (MP4, WEBM) upload karein.
errorFileSize: File bahut badi hai. Maximum size {{size}}MB hai.
interactiveGuideDescription: Image par zaroori hisse ko highlight karne ke liye, neeche diye gaye repair step par click karein.
analyzingProblem: Problem ka vishleshan ho raha hai... Kripya intezar karein.
cameraPermissionDeniedError: Camera access mana kar diya gaya hai. Is feature ko use karne ke liye, apne browser settings mein is site ke liye camera permissions on karein.
cameraAccessError: Camera access nahi ho pa raha. Ho sakta hai doosre app mein use ho raha ho. Error: {{message}}
cameraTroubleshooting: Kripya sunishchit karein ki aapka camera connected hai aur aapne is site ko use karne ki permission di hai.
videoRecordingError: Maaf kijiye, video recorder shuru karne mein error aa gaya.
voiceUnsupported: Is browser mein voice input supported nahi hai.
microphonePermissionDeniedError: Microphone access mana kar diya gaya hai. Is feature ko use karne ke liye, apne browser settings mein is site ke liye microphone permissions on karein.
confirmClearHistory: Kya aap poori repair history delete karna chahte hain? Iske baad ise vaapas nahi laya ja sakta.
arInitializing: AR Mode shuru ho raha hai...
arConnectionError: Real-time analysis service se connect nahi ho saka.
tooltipLanguage: Display language aur translation target chunein
tooltipDescription: Machine ki samasya ko detail mein batayein
tooltipUploadArea: Upload karne ke liye click karein ya file ko drag and drop karein
tooltipTakePhoto: Photo lene ya video record karne ke liye apne device ka camera istemal karein
tooltipSubmit: Problem analyze karke repair guide banayein
tooltipExport: Guide ko printable document ke roop mein export karein
tooltipUnhelpful: Is guide ko 'not helpful' mark karein
tooltipChatInput: Apna agla sawaal yahan type karein
tooltipDeleteEntry: Is history entry ko hamesha ke liye delete karein
tooltipViewGuide: Is repair guide ko load karein
tooltipClearHistory: Apni repair history se sabhi entries delete karein
tooltipConfirmClear: Poori history delete karne ki pushti karein
tooltipRetake: Ise discard karein aur dobara capture karein
tooltipUseMedia: Is media ki pushti karein aur istemal karein
tooltipSelectCamera: Available camera devices mein se chunein
tooltipToggleHighlight: Image par part highlight/un-highlight karne ke liye click karein.
